summary: Completed comprehensive testing of invoice processing app MVP. Backend APIs are fully functional with AI extraction working. Frontend UI is well-designed and responsive, but registration flow has navigation issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Login fails with test credentials (expected - credentials don't exist)

ui_bugs.issue: Registration succeeds but doesn't auto-login or redirect to dashboard

integration_issues.issue: User registration completes but stays on login page instead of auto-login

passed_tests: Backend invoice upload with AI extraction
Backend export functionality (CSV, JSON, Tally XML)
Frontend dashboard UI with stats cards
Navy Blue (#0B2B5C) and Yellow (#FFD700) color scheme
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix registration flow to auto-login users after successful registration and redirect to dashboard. Currently users must manually login after registration.
